root: ^hey there, what can I get for you?

Advice: ^There's a lot of advice out there, y'know?
^Not all of it will work but you got to find your flow.
^Ask about how to win someone over
Life: ^That's a little broad but everyone's story is different.
^Just live your life as the person you want to be and eventually you'll make it through.
^Right your wrongs and learn from your mistakes.
Feelings: ^All you can really do is let it happen.
Love: ^You can't just win someone over like some god or something.
^People will have their own feelings and thoughts and experiences so all you can really do is be a decent person.
Busy: ^I'm okay. Shift's a little eventful with that woman over there. Real party animal.
^Could you maybe go check on her for me?
